Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation:
set proxy = ##super() set proxy.couple = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.couple.key = ..CoupleKey
set proxy.couple.man = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.couple.man.gender = "Male" set proxy.couple.man.lastName = ..ManLastName set proxy.couple.man.firstName = ..ManFirstName set proxy.couple.man.dob = $ZD(..ManDOB, 3)
set proxy.couple.woman = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.couple.woman.gender = "Female" set proxy.couple.woman.lastName = ..WomanLastName set proxy.couple.woman.firstName = ..WomanFirstName set proxy.couple.woman.dob = $ZD(..WomanDOB, 3)
set proxy.couple.otherInfo = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.couple.otherInfo.country = ..Country.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.couple.otherInfo.city = ..City set proxy.couple.otherInfo.club = ..Club set proxy.couple.otherInfo.mainTrainer = ..MainTrainer set proxy.couple.otherInfo.otherTrainers = ..OtherTrainers
quit proxy

Method.name: Create
Method.Implementation:
set obj = ..%New()
set obj.Competition = competition
set obj.ManLastName = $ZCVT(couple.man.lastName, "I", "UTF8") set obj.ManFirstName = $ZCVT(couple.man.firstName, "I", "UTF8") set obj.ManDOB = $ZDH(couple.man.dob, 3)
set obj.WomanLastName = $ZCVT(couple.woman.lastName, "I", "UTF8") set obj.WomanFirstName = $ZCVT(couple.woman.firstName, "I", "UTF8") set obj.WomanDOB = $ZDH(couple.woman.dob, 3)
set obj.Country = ##class(Country).%OpenId(couple.otherInfo.country.id) set obj.City = $ZCVT(couple.otherInfo.city, "I", "UTF8") set obj.Club = $ZCVT(couple.otherInfo.club, "I", "UTF8") set obj.MainTrainer = $ZCVT(couple.otherInfo.mainTrainer, "I", "UTF8") set obj.OtherTrainers = $ZCVT(couple.otherInfo.otherTrainers, "I", "UTF8")
set obj.CoupleKey = couple.key set st = obj.%Save()
quit obj
